languages.text: "Я покаялся и передал в руки конклава информацию о разработках моего учителя. Смелых и анафематических исследованиях в запретных областях знания. С этими данными конклав мог призвать {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната на суд и под страхом экскоммьюникато трайторис принудить к покаянию. Дальнейшая его судьба мне неизвестна".

traits.locale_text: "Я покаялся и передал в руки конклава информацию о разработках моего учителя. Смелых и анафематических исследованиях в запретных областях знания. С этими данными конклав мог призвать {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната на суд и принудить к покаянию".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."
languages.original_text: "Я покаялся и передал в руки конклава информацию о разработках моего учителя. Смелых и анафематических исследованиях в запретных областях знания. С этими данными конклав мог призвать {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната на суд и под страхом экскоммьюникато трайторис принудить к покаянию. Дальнейшая его судьба мне неизвестна".

traits.locale_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archmagos{/g} Amarnat, judge him and compel repentance."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archmagos{/g} Amarnat, judge him and compel repentance."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Confesé y facilité al cónclave la información sobre la investigación de mi mentor, sus osados estudios anatemáticos sobre conocimientos prohibidos. El cónclave pudo utilizar esos datos para juzgar al {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat y obligarle a arrepentirse so pena de ser declarado Traitor Excomunicatus. Desconozco cuál fue su destino ulterior».
languages.original_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."

traits.locale_text: «Confesé y facilité al cónclave la información sobre la investigación de mi mentor, sus osados estudios anatemáticos sobre conocimientos prohibidos. El cónclave pudo utilizar esos datos para juzgar al {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat y obligarle a arrepentirse so pena de ser declarado Traitor Excomunicatus. Desconozco cuál fue su destino ulterior».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私は白状し、禁断の伝承を大胆に解剖学的に調査した我が師の研究に関する情報を評議会に引き渡した。評議会はそのデータを利用して{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトを裁判に出廷させ、大反逆者として悔い改めるよう強制することができた。彼がどのような運命をたどったのかは知らない」
languages.original_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."

traits.locale_text: 「私は白状し、禁断の伝承を大胆に解剖学的に調査した我が師の研究に関する情報を評議会に引き渡した。評議会はそのデータを利用して{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトを裁判に出廷させ、大反逆者として悔い改めるよう強制することができた。彼がどのような運命をたどったのかは知らない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我坦白了，并把我导师的研究资料，以及那些对于禁忌学识的研究交给了修会。这样一来，修会可以利用这些数据，传唤{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}阿玛纳特前来接受审判并迫使他忏悔，否则就开除他的教籍。他后来怎么样，我就不知道了。”
languages.original_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."

traits.locale_text: “我坦白了，并把我导师的研究资料，以及那些对于禁忌学识的研究交给了修会。这样一来，修会可以利用这些数据，传唤{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}阿玛纳特前来接受审判并迫使他忏悔，否则就开除他的教籍。他后来怎么样，我就不知道了。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je me suis confessé et j'ai transmis au conclave les informations concernant les recherches de mon mentor, car il s'agissait d'études anathèmes du savoir interdit. Ces données permettraient au conclave de juger l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat et de l'obliger à se repentir sous peine d'Excommunicate Traitoris. J'ignore ce qu'il est advenu de lui par la suite. »
languages.original_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis confessé et j'ai transmis au conclave les informations concernant les recherches de mon mentor, car il s'agissait d'études anathèmes du savoir interdit. Ces données permettraient au conclave de juger l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat et de l'obliger à se repentir sous peine d'Excommunicate Traitoris. J'ignore ce qu'il est advenu de lui par la suite. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe gestanden und die Informationen über die Forschungen meines Mentors der Konklave ausgehändigt. Dreiste anathematische Studien des verbotenen Wissens. Die Konklave konnte diese Daten nutzen, um {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat den Prozess zu machen und ihn zur Buße zu zwingen, unter Androhung der Strafe des Excommunicate Traitoris. Mir ist nicht bekannt, was aus ihm geworden ist."
languages.original_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gestanden und die Informationen über die Forschungen meines Mentors der Konklave ausgehändigt. Dreiste anathematische Studien des verbotenen Wissens. Die Konklave konnte diese Daten nutzen, um {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat den Prozess zu machen und ihn zur Buße zu zwingen, unter Androhung der Strafe des Excommunicate Traitoris. Mir ist nicht bekannt, was aus ihm geworden ist."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon Archmagos Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."

languages.text: "İtirafta bulundum ve yönderimin yasaklı yazıtlar üzerine yaptığı iğrenç araştırmalar hakkındaki bilgileri meclise teslim ettim. Meclis, bu veriyi kullanarak {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ı mahkemeye çıkardı ve suçlarının cezasını İhanet Aforozu'nun acısıyla ödemeye mahkûm etti. Bunu izleyen zamanlarda ona ne olduğunu bilmemekteyim."
languages.original_text: "I confessed and handed the information about my mentor's research over to the conclave, brazen anathematic studies of the forbidden lore. The conclave could use that data to summon {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat to stand trial and compel him to repent on pain of Excommunicate Traitoris. His subsequent fate is unknown to me."

traits.locale_text: "İtirafta bulundum ve yönderimin yasaklı yazıtlar üzerine yaptığı iğrenç araştırmalar hakkındaki bilgileri meclise teslim ettim. Meclis bu veriyi kullanarak {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ın mahkemeye çıkmasını sağladı ve suçlarının cezasını İhanet Aforozu'nun acısıyla ödemeye mahkûm etti. Bunu izleyen zamanlarda ona ne olduğunu bilmemekteyim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
